metadata.name: The Battling Of Cats
metadata.description:
a silly mod that replaces most things with battle cats things what is changed: -eraser => eraser cat (what started the whole mod) -guppy => basic cat -guppy's head => crazed cat head -guppy's hairball =>slime cat -guppy's paw => battle cat paw -dead cat => the soul that units drop when they die -daddy longlegs => gross cat -jacob and hitbox => kachi kach -chests => cat capsules -logo EYE OF THE STORM UPDATE -horsemen => cyclones -war => r-cyclone -grey war => metal cyclone -famine => white cyclone -blue famine => cosmic cyclone -pestilence => zyclone -grey pestilence => relic cyclone -death =>black cyclone (thanks xocolate for the doge darksüòÅ) -black death => aku cyclone -conquest => angel cyclone -headless horseman => crazed fish and crazed bird -ultra harbingers => cyclones (same as above) -ultra famine -ultra pestilence -ultra war -ultra death -host => apple cat -red host => iCat -glass cannon => crazed bahamut
official mod server (be nice and read rules) https://discord.gg/94qWcnVp
